name: AzureDevTestLabsCreateEnvironment
description: Create an Azure DevTest Labs Environment
helpMarkDown: Creates an environment in the selected lab.
author: Microsoft Corporation
releaseNotes: Works with cross-platform agents (Linux, macOS, or Windows)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running.

inputs.name: LabId
inputs.label: Lab
inputs.helpMarkDown: Lab in which the resource will be created. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting a subscription. Selecting a name from the list will extract the corresponding Lab ID. The Lab ID is a value in the form `/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/{labName}`. Variables in the form `$(varName)` are allowed.

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the environment to create.

inputs.name: RepositoryId
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Repository from which to pick a template. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting a lab. Selecting a name from the list will extract the corresponding Repository ID. The Repository ID is a value in the form `/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/{labName}/artifactSources/{repoName}`. Variables in the form `$(varName)` are allowed.

inputs.name: TemplateId
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Template that should be used to create an environment. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting a repository. Selecting a name from the list will extract the corresponding Template ID. The Template ID is a value in the form `/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/{labName}/artifactSources/{repoName}/armTemplates/{templateName}`. Variables in the form `$(varName)` are allowed.

inputs.name: ParametersFile
inputs.label: Parameters File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a ARM template parameters file that provides parameter values for the environment template.

inputs.name: ParameterOverrides
inputs.label: Parameter Overrides
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set parameter values needed by the environment template. Parameter values set by parameters file will be overridden. Expected format is -SampleParameter 'SampleValue'.

inputs.name: OutputTemplateVariables
inputs.label: Create output variables based on the environment template output?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Capture environment template output as build/release variables.

inputs.name: ExportEnvironmentTemplate
inputs.label: Export the environment template to a build artifact?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Export the DevTest Lab environment to an ARM template(s) and output as a build artifact.

inputs.name: ExportEnvironmentTemplateLocation
inputs.label: Build store location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location to store the template.

inputs.name: EnvironmentTemplateLocationVariable
inputs.label: Template Output name for location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output name for the location (_artifactsLocation) to store the template.

inputs.name: EnvironmentTemplateSasTokenVariable
inputs.label: Template Output name for the SAS token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output name for the SAS token (_artifactsLocationSasToken).

outputVariables.name: environmentResourceId
outputVariables.description: Capture the created lab environment ID

outputVariables.name: environmentResourceGroupId
outputVariables.description: Capture the created lab environment resource group ID
